updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Jordan and Simon here with a backer update on the Magic Puzzles. We’ve shifted all of our resources into manufacturing, and we are on target with our original timeline to deliver the puzzles to you in October.
When we get closer to our shipping deadline, we will send you a Kickstarter Backer Survey to collect your most up-to-date mailing address and your puzzle selection (if you need to make a choice). We haven’t asked anyone for an address yet, so please don’t be concerned!

Hey friends,
Thank you so much for supporting the first series of Magic Puzzles on Kickstarter. The response to these puzzles is overwhelming, and we are humbled and grateful for your support. We are going to do everything we can do surprise and delight you with these puzzles - as well as get them to you quickly and professionally.
Since we are already getting inundated with messages on Kickstater and social media, I wanted to go over what happens next and answer some common questions.

campaign.story:
If you’re sitting in an airport lounge with your laptop, a cafe, a plane, a train or Uber; this is where TRACPOINT shines. Use the mouse right on your laptop palm rest or almost any other surface. 
Just like writing with your pen, TRACPOINT mouse is the perfect productivity tool for all your travel needs, optimize your mobile workspace and be just as productive on the move as you are in the office.
We have combined wireless presenter technology into the mouse, providing a pointer to manage your slides, highlight sections with SpotPoint and numerous other features that enable you to present and work with just one reliable device.
The Swiftpoint range of mice are the smallest in the world for a reason! At 24gm - less than 1oz (25% of the weight of a conventional mouse) the TRACPOINT is effortless to use, anywhere, anytime. The ergonomic shape and pen-grip design put your hand, arm and shoulder into a natural position to enable continuous unstrained work.
TRACPOINT has an integrated presenter so you no longer need to carry and worry about two devices when traveling. Never get caught short with a flat battery. Use your TRACPOINT as a spotlight, move between slides and as a functional tool to swap between applications or windows. 
Use the Swiftpoint Control Panel to configure and optimize all presenter functions, colors, SpotPoint size, button functions and speed. It's a complete presenter tool to make you even more productive.
TRACPOINT uses wireless technology to seamlessly connect to your computer for a reliable and accurate connection.
PLAY

PRESENTER
Use the buttons or scroll wheel to confidently navigate through slides and presentations. The TRACPOINT's small size fits easily into the palm of your hand so you have both hands free to emphasize using hand gestures.
SPOTPOINT
TRACPOINT's SpotPoint feature lets you highlight and pinpoint critical areas of your presentation to engage your audience. Precisely navigate and identify key areas of your slides and desktop. Configure size and style of your SpotPoint.

ACTIVATE LINKS
Navigate the on-screen cursor to play or pause videos, open links and activate slides within your presentation to keep your audience on the edge of their seats. 

APPLICATION CHANGE
Use the unique TRACPOINT application changing feature to seamlessly swap between your presentation and associated materials. Build confidence with your materials and present any way you want.

We’ve spent hours researching the perfect shape, watching users struggle with a mouse, lifting and moving heavy and cumbersome devices. Even those beautiful white mice from the fruit company have many issues. Form and function must work together. We have the answer and the science to prove it. 
TRACPOINT is portable, connecting via Bluetooth and the highly accurate optical sensor is great on almost any surface. It's small enough to use on your laptop palm rest or flight tray table. Wherever you are and whenever you go the TRACPOINT is your productivity partner.
The pen-grip, small size, light weight and Rapid Charge battery combine to make the TRACPOINT the perfect travel mouse for work anywhere and anytime.
A 60 second charge gives up to 1 hour of use, while a full 1 hour charge gives up to 2 weeks of use. TRACPOINT has a great battery and charging system. The USB charging dongle simply plugs into any USB port your laptop or tablet. The self-locating magnet connector aligns the charge pins and safely holds the mouse in place when charging. Never get caught out with a flat battery again, work anywhere with confidence.  
We've made the TRACPOINT to be a specialty travel mouse, all you need in one simple package. You're getting the best travel features for a great price. 
With all TRACPOINT Kickstarter pledges you will get a complete travel package that includes: 
TRACPOINT Mouse and Presenter
USB-A Charger
Custom zip-lock carry and storage case
TRACPOINT software for Windows and Mac
To get the best performance out of your TRACPOINT mouse, presenter and GESTURE technology we created a CONTROL PANEL that gives you full control over your mouse. This configurable driver is MacOS and Windows friendly. The control panel lets you assign mouse button functions to keyboard actions, enabling you to be more efficient and productive. 
The CONTROL PANEL is the portal to your TRACPOINT customization, it's effortless to set up and optimize your mouse and presenter operation. 
We offer a lifetime of software upgrades through the control panel, we will be the TESLA of mice, providing you constant improvements and upgrades to ensure you are getting the very best productivity and support.
PLAY


We are the only product that has done this. GESTURES are when you tilt/rotate the mouse to the right-hand side (this only needs to be a few degrees). A completely new set of functions are then associated to the mouse buttons, wheel and optical sensor. You can assign shortcuts to key functions, application switching or a variety for combinations, it's like using 2 fingers swiping across a trackpad.
GESTURES are unique to Swiftpoint products, these give a great improvement in productivity and efficiency while still using small hand movements. It's like navigating around a touch-screen using your fingers, use the mouse to control all of your functions.
PLAY


Please help us by sharing with the people you know :)
We are ready for production, we need your pledge and support to kick-start our manufacturing. All the parts are made, compliance testing is underway and we are busy fine-tuning the software. These parts work beautifully, its like working on a watch. Our engineers work hard to ensure repeatable actions and light touch on all button interfaces. There is no strain on your hand, no stress on your fingers and the light weight makes the TRACPOINT effortless to use, anywhere, anytime. 

Like our previous campaigns, we will make our best efforts to ease the cost and burden of shipping by fulfilling rewards through multiple fulfillment partners around the world. To deliver TRACPOINT to you we will be using fulfillment partners in the USA and Hong Kong. Rewards bound for the US will ship from within the US. All other rewards will be shipped from Hong Kong.
Please note that we have tried to do our best but some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.
If you are unsure of your country’s customs policy please check with your local authority.
Welcome to Swiftpoint! We’ve been known for delivering award-winning mouse products using our unique ergonomic design for over a decade. We put our designs through countless cycles of user testing, refinement and continued innovation. This ensures Swiftpoint products have great ergonomics, intuitiveness and efficiency to make you more productive.
Everything we do is about making robust, high quality and productive products that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make people’s lives better and more enjoyable. This is our fourth crowdfunded project. We create great hardware partnered with innovative software to ensure you get the best value, most productive tools. We’ll deliver on time and we promise you’ll love our latest travel companion.
We've had great success with Kickstarter, in 2014 we launched the revolutionary Swiftpoint GT, in 2017 The Z, a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES and in 2018 the ProPoint was delivered successfully to all of our supporters. By backing the TRACPOINT you know we will deliver a quality mouse and presenter to all of our backers.
We are committed to helping others, we donate a percentage of our revenue to B1G1 Business for Good with our focus on funding education in Nepal.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re an experienced team that's been designing, manufacturing and delivering innovative products for over a decade. Take a look at our previous Kickstarter projects, Swiftpoint GT, The Z and the ProPoint to see the positive feedback from our amazing supporters.

We have already started component production and will deliver as soon as the campaign is complete. We’re busy making parts, proving production and pushing the timeframe for you, ensuring you get great quality, on time!

Thank you so much for your support, we can't wait to get TRACPOINT into your hands!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Swiftpoint backers,
Today we're very excited to announce our 5th crowdfunding campaign!
TRACER is Swiftpoint's latest premium gaming mouse, designed to help you play better and win more! With feedback from our previous 2017 CES gaming innovation of the year mouse, The Z, we were motivated to deliver on three key user requests when creating TRACER;

updates.update_userinfo: Swiftpoint Control Panel Update - macOS Catalina support
updates.update_content:
We've just released a new version of the TRACPOINTs Control Panel software for Mac. This includes a variety of fixes, but most notably it is now compatible with Apples latest update to macOS, Catalina.
Apple made some significant changes to macOS with this release which required us to fundamentally rework the Control Panel. In some ways this was a bit of a setback for us, but ultimately the changes it has prompted will make the Control Panel better in the long run.

It's taken a bit longer than we had hoped but the last of the second batch of TRACPOINT shipments will be underway next week.
Tracking details for the last of these are being emailed out today. As with the first batch it is expected that some backers will receive their tracking number a few days before their items ship. So don't worry if your tracking details are not active yet.
With the completion of this second batch of shipments 98% of the completed surveys will have been shipped. The remaining 2% are on hold due to problems with their shipping address. We have reached out to these backers directly, but in case anyone missed these messages the common problems with shipping addresses are as follows:

Great news for our TRACPOINT backers, dispatch is now underway! 
The initial batch of shipments (including those who submitted their surveys in the first week) are now starting to ship out. Some of you will have already received your tracking numbers, but please do not be alarmed if you have not yet. As it will take a few days for all of these orders to be processed and dispatched.
For those in the US tracking numbers will be sent to you by our fulfillment partner when your TRACPOINT ships. For the rest of the world we will be emailing out tracking numbers in larger batches. So it is expected that some backers may receive their tracking number a few days before or after their items ship.

Freight dispatch is happening soon 
Hello Backers, we have exciting news. All the stock has now been received into the country warehouses and is awaiting delivery to the regional hubs. We have provided our forwarders all your delivery information and items will soon be dispatched. For those who have purchased additional items during the survey, these will be dispatched in the same package as your TRACPOINT.

Hello TRACPOINT backers, we had a great reply from you in the last 7 days. 83% have completed the survey and used our FREE $10 credit. We now understand exactly what stock to move to each of our dispatch partners. This stock consolidation will take a few more days, we will then be able to enter all of your data and get the dispatch underway. We are all trying our hardest to get TRACPOINT to you as soon as possible. 
For those 17% who have not completed your survey, please do this as soon as possible. You will be getting reminder emails from the BackerKit team so please watch out for these.

A HUGE thank-you to all TRACPOINT backers
We couldn't have done this without you and welcome to the Swiftpoint family. We have incredible numbers: 1,203 backers, 2,672% funded, $133,607 of pledges and reaching our goal within 20 minutes. Many of you are Kickstarter veterans and its great that you have supported TRACPOINT throughout our campaign.

campaign.story:
Beam3D has designed an out of the box, easy-to-use solution for resin 3D printing.  Currently, solutions for affordable resin printing require either experience or research to get started. Our goal was to make using a resin 3D Printer easy and affordable.
The Prism
The Prism is the result of thousands of hours of use and development. The Prism removes a number of barriers through a combination of hardware and unique software features, making it approachable for non-super users.

Hardware
With an easy to remove magnetic bed and a print volume of 120mm x 70mm x 150mm, the Prism is a resin printer with a 2K LCD screen that allows for high resolution prints that look like finished products. Built with an all metal chassis for durability and a dual linear rail motion system for stability, prints can be as fine as 25 micron. The 57 watt parallel LED array drives uniform light distribution across the entire build plate, edge to edge. 
Hardware Features
Auto Leveling
Auto leveling in its purest form. The leveling system actions at the beginning of every print and when homing the machine. Instead of chasing your tail around leveling and running test prints to make sure the level is right, let the machine take care of that process.
PLAY

Dual Linear Rails - Reliable and repeatable Z movement is essential for high quality printing.
2K LCD Screen - The 2K LCD screen allows for high quality printing.
All Metal - The all metal frame provides a rigid structure for daily operation. Fully enclosed with convenient flip lid.
Parallel LED Array - The 57 Watt Parallel LED Array allows for even light distribution throughout the build area.
The 57 Watt Parallel UV Light Array allows for even light distribution throughout the build area
Software
Regardless of the material, the resin calibration gives a strong start on cure times without guessing. The auto leveling system allows for beginners and experts to just print. On the fly cure time adjustment prevents the need to alter your workflow. Finally, we provide support for all major slicers.
Software Features
Resin Calibration Print
Not sure what cure time to set for new resin? No problem. Avoid guess and check by using the built-in resin calibration print. This print provides a reasonable ballpark on what cure time to set for the resin being used -- getting you from guessing to printing faster. Just choose the column that shows the best results!
PLAY

On-the-fly Cure Time Adjustment
Avoid nuisance around cure time while you are printing. Being able to adjust the cure time on the fly can save a number of pains like needing to reslice the file just to adjust cure time, or fine tune your cure time for a resin. Don't reslice, just print and adjust.
PLAY

WiFi Support 
The Prism has a WebUI that functions as a convenient WiFi based delivery device for sliced files. In addition to delivering files, you are able to: start, stop, pause, edit profiles, and adjust printer settings. 
Current WebUI interface. Naturally, feel free to transfer files via Micro SD card if preferred!
Full Control of Machine Settings 
Anti Aliasing levels (0,2,4,8x), Movement speed, UV Power Intensity
  Allowing full control over machine settings is useful to power users and casual users alike. Want to cure a layer faster? Increase the power. Want to use a thicker resin? Adjust the Z speed and distance. Want to smooth out that lower resolution model? Enable anti-aliasing. Take advantage of more settings that many printers lock out. 
Keep the advanced settings from ChiTuBox intact, including Anti-Aliasing and Power Management
Software Compatibility
The Prism supports all major slicers, and will continue to be updated as the software for SLA printing evolves. We hope that this lets you choose the software YOU like instead of forcing a buggy difficult-to-use slicer with limited features. Currently, it supports files from ChiTuBox, Slic3r, Print Studio, and Creation Workshop.

Print Gallery

 Here is the Prism in action:
PLAY

PLAY


Resin:
In addition to the Prism, we also offer a line of 3D printer resins. They are made in America and formulated for LCD based resin printers.
Stretch Goals:


Timeline and milestones:
May 22nd - Beam3d launches Kickstarter campaign
June 22nd - Beam3d Kickstarter campaign ends
June 28th - Production of units start
July 20th - units are ready to ship and start shipping

The Beam Team
The Beam3D Team is composed of professionals who have been involved in consumer electronics for the majority of our careers. At our core, we are 3D printing guys, each with our own stable of 3D printers. In fact, a number of those printers are pieces that we have either developed or used in professional ventures throughout our careers from homebrew kits, entry level consumer models, and even up to industrial grade machines.
We see the need for high quality, low cost resin printers in the community, and we would like to be the ones to deliver on and support that dream.
  The Iterations
The Prism has gone through a number of iterations. Below are some of the different phases that the Prism has gone through.
One of our earliest prototypes.
We updated to include an LCD screen so that we could provide more control. Before we've updated the Z axis
Testing the new Z rails:
PLAY

One of our old plate designs
 First short run of production:
PLAY

New hood design!

updates.update_content:
Hello Everybody,
Last week we underwent a couple of unexpected issues and shipping delays. We had run under the impression that shipping was continuing as normal, but this was incorrect. We have discovered that there were a few issues that prevented our shipping partner from proceeding as planned, outlined below:
On 10/17, we found a small number of customers had not their orders in complete. The following Monday and Tuesday (10/21-10/22) we elected to pause shipment to do an inventory count and identify the underlying issue behind this to prevent mis-ships on other orders. The underlying issue has been identified and remedied.

Hello Everybody,
As folks are receiving their printers, we are starting to see a lot of great questions. We want to consolidate the more popular questions into updates so that everybody can work on the same information and have increased success early on!
Most Common Issue:  Prints sticking to the FEP liner, or more importantly, NOT the buildplate

updates.update_userinfo: Early Insight: Most Common Troubleshoot Issue!
updates.update_content:
Hello Everybody!
As printers are starting to land at their final destinations, we wanted to share some helpful information that should get you printing fast and easily.
There are online resources for the Beam3D Backers. The manual will be a great starting point. We recommend walking through the "First Inspection"and "Quick Start/First Print" sections. After the first print, the guide provided to use ChituBox will be the next step to slicing your own files.

updates.update_userinfo: Some Helpful Information to Get You Started
updates.update_content:
Hello Everybody,
Testing has completed, and we are on the next phase of delivery for the Prism!
Major update, we are shipping! All backers who have completed their survey will be shipping over the course of the next 2 weeks.
Backers who have completed their survey will be receiving a tracking number through the Survey email within the next 2 weeks. Please be sure to check your spam folder if you do not receive your tracking number. If you have not completed your survey, we encourage you to complete it as soon as possible.

Hello Everybody!

The printers have landed in California sooner than expected! Over the next few days we will be doing our testing and getting these ready to ship out to all of our backers!
We are aiming to get the printers turned around and shipped relatively quickly. More to come shortly.

Hello Backers!
We are coming today with some awesome news following our previous update – the printers are being shipped to our warehouse in the United States. We are estimating 30-45 days before they land (there is a little grace time built into the estimate in the event of oddity on transit or time to clear customs) and for us to do our internal testing (estimating 10 days). That lines out to a total estimate of 40-55 days when we will begin shipping to our backers in the United States! International backers, we will have further information for you shortly regarding shipping timeline.

Hello Everybody,
We wanted to share a quick update showing the boxing and palatalization for the printers to be consistent with what is showing on our Facebook group. 
If you have not joined the Facebook group, we encourage you to check it out. In time, it will outlive the Kickstarter page as one of our community hubs, which we intend to be active in and work with customers from all over the world. For those who dislike Facebook, we will be launching a blog with our website for major announcements in the future as well.

campaign.story:
Entirely made with a technical polymer that guarantees, at the same time, great strength and rigidity of the poles and excellent flexibility of the arms, Pluvi is an ultra durable, lightweight and colorful umbrella, with exceptional resistance when subjected to wind stress and a weight of only 265 grams.
The stretcher, designed to last thousands of opening and closing cycles, is made of a single piece of flexible material with integrated joints.
Unlike traditional umbrellas, which are made up of a multitude of pins and rigid rods that break easily, our particular patented geometry allows it to flex elastically, avoiding deformation and damage.
The number of components has been considerably reduced, from over 130 in traditional umbrellas to just 24 in Pluvi. The assembly has been simplified by replacing the traditional screws and hinges with long-lasting snap-fit, increasing the overall reliability of the umbrella.
The handle and the shaft have been designed to take full advantage of the high flexibility of the whole umbrella when it is subjected to wind stress.
The canvas, made with a high density micro fiber Pongee 210T fabric, ensures a high degree of water repellency that allows water droplets to quickly slip away and performs an important protective function by shielding 95% of UVA and UVB rays.
We compared Pluvi, in terms of Durability and Flexibility, with traditional umbrellas of the same Price Range.
PLAY

Few components to minimize the chances of failure and all produced by the same injection moulding technology. Our unique technical polymer, used for every single element of the umbrella, has been specifically developed to be easily recovered and reused for the manufacturing of new products.
Perfectly suitable for a complete cradle-to-cradle system or an alternate version made from zero-impact biodegradable polymers.
Pluvi is an umbrella with a modern look and attractive colors, combining sustainability with Italian style.
For those who are looking for something practical and stylish or simply as a useful original gift.
Traditional Umbrellas are made of many rigid metal parts not suitable to withstand the stress of the wind.  Once broken it’s almost impossible to repair and the recycling of the materials turns out to be difficult and very expensive.
The data collected by the International Trade Center states that over 2.5 Million umbrellas per day are imported by the major countries in the world; since the global market is stable, this means that:
If we consider that in a traditional umbrella (average weight of 350 grams) there are approximately 280 grams of metal and almost 1 square meter of fabric, this means that:
Let’s put these numbers in perspective:
We have been developing Pluvi over the past 3 years; at present Pluvi is in the pre-series production phase utilizing temporary moulds. This is a truly passionate project for our team and we are here to ask for your support in making it a success.
With your help we can shine a light on a fresh design and a new solution and introduce an umbrella that is fully recyclable and can actually improve the environment.
Stretch Goal #1
Stretch Goal #2
To see the result of the vote click HERE.
 If you like to support our idea, please leave a feedback on our social pages and spread the word between your friends.

updates.update_content:
Dear contributors,
in February, having solved the technical problems that had forced us to completely redesign the stretcher, we took action to obtain the necessary financial resources that would allow us to manufacture the new molds and produce your umbrellas.
Then the advent of the pandemic which, initially in China and then all over the world, has basically blocked everything.

Dear supporters,
due to the COVID-19 health crisis affecting the whole world, we would like to share with you some news about the production of your umbrellas.
As regards our nation, Italy, the situation is very dramatic. On one hand, we have just finished the quarantine, which lasted almost 60 days, and only now we are trying to understand when we will be able to resume our activities. On the other hand, we are waiting for the Italian Government, together with the European Community, to adopt the extraordinary measures to support the economic recovery, which have so far been announced but not yet implemented. But above all, we are trying to understand when and how we will be allowed to move to China to follow the various production phases.

Dear contributors,
we finished a couple of weeks ago to test the prototype. All the improvements we implemented on the joints given us satisfactory results both in terms of functionality and reliability.
We performed 2 different types of tests; the first concerned the opening and closing cycles (a condition that occurs every time the umbrella opens and closes), the second was about its ability to flex, avoiding deformations and damage (a circumstance that occurs when the wind turns the canopy upside down).

Dear contributor,
we finished few days ago the prototyping mold for the improved version of the stretcher; you can see in the picture below the old version (in Light Orange) compared with the new one (in Light Blue).

Dear contributors,
we finished a few days ago to redesign the stretcher; in the picture below the new drawing showing the changes that have been made.

Dear contributor,
few days ago we came back from China after checking the new stretcher but we are sorry to announce that we don’t have good news; basically also the new joints, manufactured with the mold with the “hot runner” technology, show problems concerning the reliability.
We have therefore delayed some days this update in order to discuss with our partners the possible solution.

Dear contributor,
last week we came back from China after checking the progress of the project.
We have attached, only as reference, the following picture to give you a very simple idea about all the components that are part of a Mold.

Dear contributor,
below you can find an update about the progress of the project.
Our European Partner finished the in-depth analysis of the stretcher; they basically confirmed us that the current mold, realized with a technology called “Cold Runner”, was absolutely unsuitable for manufacturing such a complex component as our arm, guaranteeing the necessary quality and reliability.

Dear contributors,
we have just finished the investigation on reliability problems related to the joints of the arm.
Please see below the tests we have done, the results we have achieved and what we need to do to solve them.

Dear contributors, here our latest news:
We finished the manufacturing of all the multi-cavity molds a couple of days ago; we therefore started the mass production of the pieces. 
At the same time, we also assembled the first 100 umbrella samples in order to verify both the quality of each single components and the frame as a whole.

project_data.project_name: PLUVI — A Revolutionary Umbrella as never seen before.

campaign.story:
Getting your prints to stick, then getting them off your machine is 90% of your 3D printing issues and worries! 
First you do everything you can to get the filament to stick for the first layer and keep on holding,  then you finally get a good stick, and your new worries are how to get the parts off the print bed.
Wham Bam Flexible Build System is your solution to all your troubles!
° Your prints stick easily from first layer onward! 
first layer perfection with our Wham Bam PEX Build Surface
° Simply bend our Flexi Plate and your prints pop off! 
° A quick wipe with alcohol, slap the Flexi Plate onto the Magnetic Base and you are back to printing! 
our kits are like no others on the market!
Wham Bam kits are comprised of 4 parts that are each designed for performance and made from the highest quality of materials available.   
Wham Bam Flexible Build System Kit Contents
We have developed the Wham Bam PEX Build Surface from a specially formulated polymer with a higher melt point than even PEI to attract most any filament without damaging the sheet, and parts easily pop off once cooled and flexed.  
Pre-backed with 3M adhesive so it takes seconds to install
the Wham Bam Flexi Plate is made from high quality flexible spring steel designed to be bent thousands of times without kinking. The spring alloy contains a high level of chromium to ensure no rust or oxidation for its lifetime.  They can be used with our PEX or PEI build surfaces, or any other product of your preference should you ever destroy you’re surface, just peel it off, add another and keep using our kit!    Even keep extra Flexi Plates on hand to do a live swap and speed up your work flow to the max!
The Wham Bam Magnetic Base has been specially formulated to resist high temperatures for long periods of time, without any loss of performance.  Guaranteed to resist heated beds up to 130°C continuously. They are pre-backed with high temperature 3M adhesive making installation a breeze! 
We’ve thought of everything, our kits even come with 4 thin aluminum Wham Bam Shims, pre-backed with adhesive so you can easily get your bed perfectly flat before installing the Magnetic Base. 
No more tape, glue, hair spray, ABS slurry, special additives.
All of your filaments stick to our proprietary PEX build surface.  
No more messing with binder clips and limiting your build area!  
Print edge to edge with our magnetic bed.  
No more stabbing hands, breaking parts, or gouging build surfaces trying to get your prints off the bed. 
Just bend our Flexi Plate and parts magically pop right off!   
Stop chiseling parts on your machine, ruining your calibration or damaging its precision parts. 
Lift off our plate to remove prints outside of the machine. 
No more lost time waiting for your heavy glass or aluminum bed to cool down, prying to remove prints, cleanup of glues and tape and re-application.  
Get right back to printing with no or little down time, just put the flexi plate back on machine and you are in business. Even keep extra Flexi Plates on hand to do a live swap and speed up your work flow to the max!  
Our kits are currently available in 6 varied square sizes to fit many different printers.  
Check your printer bed dimensions to see which kit best fits your printer 
*******att: 
The fit to your machine is the buyer's responsibility, so measure using our kit measurements, please note that the spring steel Flexi Plate has two front tabs that stick out beyond the kit size by 10 (smaller kits)-15 (larger kits) mms. 
all machines in bold have been tested and verified
For all other machines; you must measure to be sure our size will fit on your printer and that there are no obstructions.  
Any open sided machine would theoretically allow for a slightly larger Wham Bam flexible build kit than the machine's bed size.  
The Wham Bam Magnetic Base can be cut down and the Wham Bam Flexi Plate can overhang a bit. *******
*****Please also note our system needs a heated bed for PEX to work well, otherwise you may have to use build surface with glues or hairspray*****
 165 x 165 mms  6.5” x 6.5”     fits:  Creality Ender 2,  Tronxy X1, Tevo Michelangelo, Zonestar Z6F, Lulzbot Mini (may fit with overhang)
 220 x 220 mms  8.7” x 8.7”        fits:  Prusa i3, Anet A8, Cocoon 3D Printer Touch, Wanhao Duplicator 6 and Duplicator i3 and i3 Plus, Ultimaker 1 and 2 and 3, MonoPrice Maker Select Plus and Ultimate and V2, Robo R2,  TronXY X2

we are also on the look out for any other popular sizes so if you don’t see your size send us a note and if we get enough requests we will make it and let you know when its going into production!
Our kits were designed to be super easy to install so the beginner needs no special skills or tools and the print farmer doesn't loose valuable time between prints.
You can install the whole system in 5 minutes max!
steps: 
1.  Clean your existing bed surface.
2.  Check to see if your bed is planar and flat, if not, you can correct with our included Aluminum Shims.
3.  Peel back paper from Wham Bam Magnetic Base adhesive, line up with one edge of your bed, check position, then peel back rest of paper while rubbing down.
4.  Clean your Wham Bam Flexi Plate with alcohol and apply your Wham Bam PEX Build surface just as you applied the Magnetic base.  Remove the protective film from the PEX. Pro tip: For extra grip scuff your PEX surface with 000 steel wool. 
5.  Slap your Flexi Plate on the Magnetic Base and you are good to go
see full detailed instructions on installation and preparation below:
Wham Bam was created when Peter Solomon, a long time inventor, award-winning designer, maker and 3D printing addict realized that many of his personal modifications to his printers would be very useful to all 3D printers. 
Peter has been contributing to the community for years by posting his models to thingiverse,  his how-to videos on youtube, and his advice to many forums.   He became obsessed with resolving first layer adhesion as this is one of the issues that affects every 3d printer, and then needed to find a way to get prints off the bed easier.   When he made his first prototype and shared on social media nearly everyone wanted one,  and BAM - 
Wham Bam was born.
Wham Bam will be making many other products, and always following the same mission:  Making 3D printing Easy, Productive and Fun!
Wham Bam has been through a year of product development, testing, refinement, material engineering, further testing and design. 
For the last month we have been going through a Beta Test Round with select testers on various machines.  Each beta tester prints for different reasons and with a range of materials.  
We have taken their comments and suggestions and improved our product,  we have established production and supply and already created our test samples and prototypes with the same factories who will execute our production orders.
We are ready to go! In order to be able to offer competitive pricing on these top of the line materials we need to purchase in mass, we also need to create some simple tooling to cut materials to size and shape and to create our new robust packaging. With the Kickstarter funding we can get this into production in as little as 3 weeks from the goal met date!
see what our Beta testers are saying about our system!
Rob R.  "I honestly stopped using my printer for a while because my prints stuck so well that I'd ruin them or break the glass trying to get them off. The Wham Bam System has got me heavily into 3D printing again. Thank you guys!"
Robert B. "Great product! Very impressed. keep up the great work"
Bryan H.  "All component materials are high quality and manufactured very well!!!  Installation is easy and straight forward. Magnetic binding, spring steel performance and initial pex performance are all top notch. You have the product, service, and customer service at the highest level, praise I never an able to give."
James P.   "The fact that the magnets are able to withstand higher temperatures puts this system in a class of it’s own. Capable of using a wide range of materials that other companies cannot claim without damaging their magnetic sheet permanently."
Carlos P "I’m liking how the prints look. Super smooth on the bottom. And I love that it just pops off. No more spatula. My installation experience went pretty smooth"
Bryan V. "Man, thats amazing, you saw that was super super easy to remove. And check out that super smooth finish on that first layer, so nice. The prints still stick when they're supposed to and they are super easy to pop off when done. "
John R.  "Beta Test for Wham Bam. Great product! Want more plates in the future, and much more reasonably priced than you-know-who. "
Patrick L.  "Wanted to share my experience so far. This is actually my first print with the new bed and it worked great! The bottom layer is the smoothest and shiniest I've ever had and everything stuck perfectly. Even the base of the supports was glass smooth. So far, this is exceeding my expectations"
 We need your help and support. 
We are almost there, we cant wait to get this flexible build kit on every machine possible and help the 3D community out by making their lives simpler and more productive.  
Check out our Stretch Goals!
If we surpass $50k of sales we will throw in a free extra PC build plate to every kit ordered.
And if we surpass $100k we will throw in an extra PEX build surface to every kit ordered.
So if you want these freebies, please spread the word, get your friends to see our campaign and help us to get the message out. 
 Please make your pledge, if you have one machine - order early and be one of the first to get one.   If you run a print farm - order for all of your machines and take advantage of the early bird discounts!  And if you don't have 3D printers but would like to help,   your contribution would be greatly appreciated!    
                                                                    -thank you!  from the team at Wham Bam
help us to spread the word by clicking on all of the buttons below and sharing our project with your communities!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our goal is to make delivery by the end of 2018, we have already set up manufacturing during the beta testing so there should be no long delays is product delivery. Our beta test kits arrived within our estimated time frame and we expect the same for this Kickstarter production run. If any unexpected delays happen we will make sure to commuicate them to all backers ASAP.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Wham Bam - The Best Flexible Bed for 3D Printers Available!

campaign.story:
Have you ever been annoyed by abruptly interruption while your 3D printer is running (Tangled filament, Nozzle jam, Power outage), causing the 3D print to fail? Do you feel depressed when your 3D printer stops at where the print is almost finished, you have to spend whole day to print it again? Are you worried if your 3D printer will print a huge objective, which will last more than 24 hours?
If your answer is yes, Resumer 3D will release your worries. Resumer 3D, an affordable and magical tiny module, is designed to resume interrupted 3D prints from any printed layer automatically. Resumer 3D is super easy to use; you simply connect it to your 3D printer via USB cable, leave your 3D printer alone and go out for a date. Resumer 3D will monitor and accurately record 3D printing data, as a result, it can resume interrupted prints due to power interruptions, tangled filament, nozzle jam and even intentional interrupts. Resumer 3D will change the way you 3D print and design.  
How does it work? 
Resumer 3D simulate the way of how 3D printer software works, sending out and receive G-code by USB port. By this way, when your printer is working, Resumer 3D will monitor the status of the 3D printer, record the printing data in real-time. Furthermore, there is a super capacitor built in Resumer 3D, even if the power shuts off unexpectedly, the super capacitor will keep Resumer 3D alive and store your printing information solidly. When you turn on 3D printer, as Resumer 3D has stored all the printed data, it can resume the prints from any printed layer automatically. Resumer 3D makes everything easier.
 At beginning, we posted Resuemer 3D project on hackaday.io, many people are doubt that why Resumer 3D is so compatible as it can work with different 3D printers. Thanks to my team, we have tried our best to insert different USB drivers of different 3D printers; furthermore, as how Repetier-Host and Cura control 3D printer, Resumer 3D use the same way to communicate with 3D printer and control it by G-code command. Following picture is the first version:
 What we can do with Resumer 3D? 
1. Resuming directly from interrupted prints.
Nozzle stops at the middle of the prints 
When the printer is working, unexpected things may happen randomly. We will be lucky if the nozzle stops at the middle of prints, when the printer stops unintentionally due to power outrage. At this situation, Resumer 3D will resume the prints flawlessly, the same as it`s printed without stops. 
 Nozzle stops at the edge of the prints. 
When the printer is working happily, it will be still no worry if the printer is interrupted due to power outrage, however, the nozzle stops at the edge of the prints. Resumer 3D is eligible for resuming the prints as well. 
PLAY

Here is the print, as you can see, the resuming result is pretty good:  
 2. Resuming interrupted prints from any printed layer. 
 As you may already know, sometimes the filament runs out or the filament is broken during the printing, we are absent as well. When we come back, finding that printer is working without filament, big gap between the print and nozzle. What should we do? Print it again? No, with Resumer 3D, we can turn off 3D printer, then turn on it, adjust the Z-axis height of the nozzle, resume the print from specified layer. 
PLAY

When you resume prints from any printed layer, adjusting the height to proper position is very key factor if you can get perfect result.  
 3. Print Multi-color object with Resumer 3D by single extruder. 
Have you ever thought about printing a colorful object with your single extruder 3D printer? However, it is almost impossible or too complicated unless you choose colorful filament or editing G-code. Good news is that you can print multi-color easily with Resumer 3D. You can turn off the printer to change the filament, when it is ready, turn on the printer again, Resumer 3D will resume the interrupted prints, amazing and easy, isn`t it?  
PLAY

 Printing a colorful haummer for Sol is such an easy thing.  
4. Printing with inserts, Resumer 3D will change the way of 3D designing. 
 As more and more engineers are using 3D printer, the field 3D printer applied to expends. It is common for engineer to design parts with inserts, will 3D printer be still eligible for this task? With Resumer 3D, the answer absolutely is “yes”, you can insert any metal parts you want during the printing. What you need to do is turning off the 3D printer, putting inserts into printings.
PLAY

 The following airfoil, we designed for Drone, the carbon wing has inserted printing successfully.  
Features:  
Compared to other solutions in the market, such as Rasberry +Power monitoring module, high-level main board, Resumer 3D has the following features: 
 1. Affordable and worthy: Just 21 dollars, you do not have to spend hundred dollars to buy a Rasberry Pi and Power monitoring module, you do not have to buy the extra Mainboard either. With 21 dollars, you can save hundreds of filaments.
2. Easy to use: You simply connect Resumer 3D to your 3D printer via USB cable, leave it alone. No headache of editing G-code, no afraid of technical problems when you choose Rasperry Pi.  
3. High Compatibility: Currently Resumer 3D is compatible with most of marlin firmware based 3D printer. We have integrated all the USB drivers for 3D printer that we can find in the market to MCU (Miro Controller Unit). The most challenge thing is that different mainboards have different USB drivers, what`s more, part of the mainboards do not have USB drivers, then we have to develop for them. Fortunately, we overcome this obstacle, we are happy to share our product on Kicktstarter.  
4. Powerful: Resumer 3D can resume your interrupted prints from any printed layer instead of resuming only from where the nozzle stops like other solutions. There are many different reasons blamed for interrupted 3D prints, for example, Tangled filament, Nozzle jam, Power outage, you will find that only resuming from where the printer stops is not good enough. If there is a big gap between the nozzle and the prints, it doesn`t work, you have to spend many hours to print it again. With Resumer 3D, you can adjust the Z axis height to the perfect height, the printer will resume to print as if it never stops.  
Product testing   
The height resolution of Resumer 3D is 0.2mm.You can resume your interrupted printings successfully with the following two requirements: 
1. The minimal printed height should be 0.2mm； 
2. The minimal printed time should be 2 minutes. 
Resuming printings: 
 When are testing Resumer 3D, please wait for at least 10 seconds before you turn on 3D printer after turning it off. Otherwise, you may find that there is NO SD card when you try to resume the printings. 
 Suggestion: 
When you test Resumer 3D with power outrage module, turn on the printer after turning off it for at least 10 seconds, otherwise the printer may not detect the SD card, as a result, Resumer 3D could not resume the prints. Please do not touch printings and X-axis, Y-axis, Z-axis (Except for moving the extruder.), when you resume the printer, in case of failure printing due to the movement of printings.  
Technical Details:
Length: 69.4mm, Width: 29.5mm, Height: 17mm 
Weight: 28g  
Resolution: 0.2mm   
Resuming Height ≤ 2m  
   Production TimeLine  
Special thanks: 
Resumer 3D Team is an international team, our team members are from United States, China, United Kingdom and Italy. We would like to give the best wishes to Mark Cole from United States from Australia. During this project, his famliy on hard times, Mark Cole`s family got bad flu. However they still do his best to make this project online successfully. They are strong and I believe that they will recover soon. Thank you for everyone, thank you for 3D printer!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With one year`s hard work, Resumer 3D comes out, both hardware and software are tested hundreds of times until they work perfectly, we are confident with Resumer 3D. 
What`s more, we have partners in Shenzhen, China, who will be in charge of the manufacturing and QC to guarantee that we can deliver the products in high quality in time. 
Although we have tested almost all the 3D printers that we can find in the market, we may miss some of them. If you find that your 3D printer is not compatible with Resumer, please get in touch with us, our technical team will upgrade the firmware for you, here is the link where you can download the latest firmware: https://github.com/Resumer3d/info. Thanks for your support.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story: PLAY
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every project comes with risks, and we’re no different. Between all of us we have over 30 years of experience working with manufacturers to produce products. We know first hand that delays and obstacles happen, but that first hand knowledge helps us to set realistic goals and overcome any challenges.

We have to finalize our design, purchase tooling, debug the tooling and then mass produce. We also have to get proper testing and certification done since we’re using batteries, wireless communication, and making a product that will hold food.

Our desire to ship product in February of 2019 reflects some expected delays in each of these areas because we know they will come up. We’ve seen too much.

We’re committed to shipping you a great product, made of high quality materials, and that seamlessly integrates into your life. So if a slight delay leads to improvements in any of these, we’re likely to take that tradeoff. But we’ll be sure to communicate all of this to you, our backers, who are on this journey with us.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Team Ovie!
It's been a crazy productive summer for Ovie and we wanted to share a progress update with you.
We've had our heads down finalizing development leading to a pilot run, and we're pleased to say everything is moving along nicely. Our prototypes proved out our concept, but to move into mass production we needed to shrink the board just a little bit, ensure we've selected the right chipsets and hardware for long-term success, and coordinate with our mechanical engineers to make sure that Smarterware is a joy to use for every customer.

updates.update_userinfo: Update on Development and Shipping Timeline!
updates.update_content:
Thank you so much for making our project a reality! 
Since the campaign closed we have been busy kicking off our partners to complete pre-production for Smarterware and wrapping up our next steps to finish up on Kickstarter.
A few things need to happen before we can finalize our production kick off and start working towards fulfillment. Here's a quick rundown: First, Kickstarter needs to transfer over the funds so we have the money to make the rewards (this can take up to two weeks). Second, we have to finalize your rewards and  be sure we know where we need to ship them.

We're closing in on the finish line of this campaign, and we're so grateful for all of the support so far. We have over 450 new members to Team Ovie and are kicking off our production teams now.
As members of Team Ovie, we'd be so grateful if you could be sure, in these last 40 hours of our campaign, to share our campaign with your friends, family, and networks.
Simply copy this link and post it to Facebook, Tweet it, or email it out telling people why you like Ovie and what inspired you to back our campaign.

We are into our last week on Kickstarter, and it's been pretty incredible. We're so excited to move into the production phase of Smarterware, and we can't wait to give you updates on the progress of that part of the journey when the time is right.
If you know of any friends or family who would want to be the first to get Smarterware in their home, be sure to share our campaign out with them before it closes.
The next step in the journey is underway and we're feeling great about delivering product on time to the over 400 of you who have backed our project to date. Your response to Ovie on Kickstarter has opened up some doors that we couldn't have even imagined prior to launching our campaign, and as we're able to do so, we'll share those out in future updates.

project_data.project_name: Ovie Smarterware: The First Connected Food Storage System

campaign.story:
Are you a maker? Do you enjoy building things yourself? Do you have a project that needs lithium-ion batteries for energy storage?
We created a solution just for you! Our 18650 battery connectors make it easy to build your own DIY lithium-ion batteries of any size, voltage, capacity and power level that you need to fit your project! 
18650 cells are one of the most prevalent types of lithium-ion battery cells. They are available from dozens of companies in hundreds of varieties. This makes them an ideal cell for custom battery builders.
[Journalist? Check out our Media Kit]
However, the most commonly used method of joining them - spot welding - requires expensive tools that most hobbyists don't have. That's why we created the Vruzend caps - to help you build the perfect battery for you!
Unlike spot welding or soldering, Vruzend caps allow you to assemble and disassemble a battery pack easily. This is helpful for modular applications where your battery size or capacity may change over time, or to allow you to swap out batteries over time as they inevitably weaken. You're no longer stuck with tossing an entire battery because a single cell went bad.
The new V2.0 terminal caps
Our system uses an interlocking dovetail design to securely join the caps together like children's toy blocks. Once the caps are connected, you simply insert your battery cells. Now each cell has a threaded post terminal allowing for easy and customizable connections.
Easily assemble 18650 cells into any battery pack size and configuration
We have been testing our current version (V1.5) of the Vruzend DIY battery building kit all over the world and with great responses. However, the power ability of the kit was somewhat lower in the initial version. We have been working hard on a new version of the kit to allow higher power capabilities and are excited to announce that it is finally here! The Vruzend V2.0 kit works just like the V1.5 kit that has been tried and tested, but uses pure copper bus bars and copper alloy spring contacts to allow much higher power levels, as high as 20 A continuous per cell! 
Improvements made in our most recent kits include:
Superior polymer for more resilient plastic caps
Elongated terminal posts to allow more busbars
Spring contact includes stopper for more even insertion
Improved mold tolerances makes assembly even easier
The copper based components in the new V2.0 kits are nickel coated, taking advantage of the high conductivity of pure copper and the corrosion resistance of pure nickel.
The Vruzend team has been working for months to bring our V2.0 kit to the market, and we fully expect to begin shipping V2.0 kits in May for our early bird rewards and June for our secondary rewards (once the early bird rewards are sold out). The first group of V2.0 kits will only be available here on Kickstarter, and then will be available on www.Vruzend.com afterwards. Make sure to take advantage of the special kickstarter pricing now though, as we won't be able to offer the kits for this price for long!
We are offering both kits, our existing Vruzend V1.5 kit and the new Vruzend V2.0 kit as rewards for backing our Kickstarter campaign. You can find details for each reward level and the option to pledge for that reward on the right-hand side of this screen.
The contents of each kit include:
V1.5 kit (includes enough for 52 cells):
104 caps with SS spring contacts
104 SS nuts
130 SS bus bars
6 brass wire clamps
6 zip ties
Note: The V1.5 kit is rated at 3.5A continuous and 7A peak per cell
Everything included in the V1.5 kit
V2.0 kit (enough for 30 cells):
60 caps with nickel-plated copper alloy spring contacts 
60 nickel-plated copper alloy nuts 
90 nickel-plated pure copper bus bars 
4 nickel-plated copper alloy clamps 
4 zip ties
Note: the V2.0 kit is rated at 20A continuous and 25A peak per cell
Everything included in the V2.0 kit
Vruzend is also the proud sponsor of multiple electric and solar-electric race car teams, including Team Sunergy from Appalachian State University! Pictured below with their award-winning solar race car, Team Sunergy is using the Vruzend 2.0 kit in the battery of their next-generation solar race car. Pictured below is the DTU Okami racing team developing an electric racing motorcycle, and last but not least, the students on the WWHS EV Team are the current defending champions of the Google Gravity Games and are also using Vruzend battery packs!
So far we've shipped our existing version of the Vruzend kits to over 100 countries around the world. Below are just a few of the countless user-submitted photos we've received back from successful DIY battery projects around the globe.
User-submitted DIY Vruzend battery packs
 If you aren't already experienced with battery building, we highly recommend doing some research and preparing for your first DIY battery. The best resource to teach you how to build custom DIY lithium-ion batteries is Micah Toll's #1 bestseller, DIY Lithium Batteries, available on Amazon in both paperback and Kindle e-book formats.
To see an example of a battery being assembled with the V2.0 battery building kit, check out this video: https://youtu.be/d2FCvW6S6Wk
And to discuss Vruzend DIY battery building kits more, join the facebook group here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/Vruzend/
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any manufacturing project, there is a chance that the manufacturing process will take longer than expected and delay our schedule. However, we have taken every effort to ensure that we will remain on schedule.

We waited to begin our Kickstarter campaign until we were 90% prepared for production, instead of starting much earlier like many other campaigns have. This meant we couldn't start taking pre-orders as quickly as we'd like, but that we have only a small amount of final work to finish before we can begin final production of your battery-building kits!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Thank you to everyone who has backed our project so far! Because of you guys, we hit our funding goal in under 10 hours! 
What does that mean? It means that our Kickstarter campaign is now successful and everyone will absolutely be getting their Vruzend battery building kits when we begin shipping in May!
There are still 16 days left in our campaign, and we'd love if you helped share our Kickstarter page with any friends that may be interested. And don't forget to reach out and contact us if you have any questions. You can find us on the on our site or on our as well!

campaign.story:
EarJellies - The World's Most Comfortable Ear Plugs! 
EarJellies are 17x softer than foam ear plugs. They won't cause irritation or fall out like foam earplugs either. 
Reusable and Easy to Clean
 EarJellies can be reused many times. Cheap foam earplugs can get expensive when a new pair is used every time. EarJellies will last several months or even years with proper care. 
Excellent for Side-Sleepers
EarJellies will not extend out of the ear canal too far, making them a great choice for side-sleepers. Once inserted properly, EarJellies will not work their way out of your ear canal half way through the night. They will stay in place all night for improved sleep. 
 Silence the Snorer in Your Life!
Great for Water Sports
EarJellies provide a reliable water-tight seal for swimming, surfing, kayaking, snorkeling and other water sports. The seal will not leak after extended use to help prevent ear infections and exostosis or "swimmer's ear". 
EarJellies will also properly fit smaller ear canals in children to prevent infections.
 Multiple Sizes for a Custom-like Fit
When it comes to earplugs, a "one-size-fits-all" approach doesn't work for everyone. Ear canals come in many different shapes and sizes. EarJellies come in multiple sizes to find your own custom-like fit, especially for those with extra small or extra large ear canals. 
Low-Profile and Discreet
EarJellies sit flush against the outer ear for a discreet look - great for concerts and clubs.  
Perfect for Concerts and Clubs
Great for Long Motorcycle Rides
Protect your hearing at the race track
Stadium noise can reach dangerous levels
What makes EarJellies so different from all other earplugs out there?
EarJellies are the only earplug made of MemorySil™ - a patented, unique viscoelastic silicone rubber with shape memory. Whenever it is stressed or deformed, MemorySil gradually adapts to its new situation and slowly relaxes to almost perfect softness. MemorySil is a dual network elastomer: a network liquid piggybacking on a network solid. The network solid has permanent crosslinks that give the material a stable shape, but with a very small modulus. The network liquid has temporary crosslinks that allow it to adapt gradually to new shapes and with a much larger modulus. Those two networks act together to give MemorySil unparalleled viscoelastic properties. For example, MemorySil is remarkably aware of time, appearing firm and elastic on short timescales, but soft and accommodating on long timescales. Even its mathematical modeling is unusual; whereas the stress-strain behaviors of elastic solids and Newtonian liquids are described by integer-order differential equations, MemorySil's stress-strain behaviors are described by fractional-order differential equations. Essentially, MemorySil gives EarJellies a custom-like fit for a more comfortable, reliable seal to block more noise.
10x Time-Lapse
PLAY

 ANSI S3.19-1974 - NRR Rated 25 decibels
Easy to Insert Correctly
Proper insertion is essential to achieve the given noise reduction rating (NRR) of any earplug. EarJellies will slide into the ear canal easier than foam for a proper fit. Here's an excellent study on laboratory results vs real world noise reduction of several different earplugs. The differences are huge! Proper insertion can mean 100x or more noise reduction. 
 Soft and Comfortable for Everyday Use
EarJellies will gradual conform to the shape of your unique ear canal shape and size. The "feel and seal" is simply better than foam or rubber earplugs.
EarJellies in the news!
This Physics Professor Has Invented a Better Earplug
UVA professor invents new earplugs
Technology-Medical/Hearing Loss
  EarJellies Podcast
EarJellies Podcast
Thank you for your support!
info@earjellies.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We're currently gearing up for large scale manufacturing. At present, we can produce EarJellies with all the right specifications, however, the process is slow, inefficient and expensive. We have reinvented the earplug from the ground up, including new manufacturing techniques. New tooling is very expensive for high-volume manufacturing. We've had to re-engineer traditionally used production and tooling methods because they were not suitable for EarJellies. We are on track to meet (possibly beat) our forecasted deadlines for delivery and we do not expect any delays in shipping the rewards to our backers. Thank you for backing this project!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Check out our detailed video overview of the ActionHat Mesh and ActionHat Visor! See how you can even pop our patent-pending frame into your own hat for a completely custom ActionHat. 
Sure, it looks like just some hat with a GoPro on it, but it's a little bit more than that - we promise! You see, we hated the elastic head strap so much, that we invented the ActionHat. 
PLAY

The problem with the elastic head strap is that you can't put it on one-handed when you're in the middle of the action. And, as you can tell by our video, we are fishermen - so when we're fighting fish with both hands on the rod and reel, we can't fumble around with a head strap. Or worse yet, accidentally drop it in the water while trying to put it on.
PLAY

Being able to pop it on one-handed when you want to capture that BIG moment, is a BIG deal. We discovered this through a simple DIY - by screwing in a GoPro to the bill of the hat. Unfortunately, that DIY hat along with our $400 camera sank to the bottom of the ocean. So with the ActionHat, we made it FLOAT! If you spend anytime near or on the water, consider the ActionHat an insurance policy for your expensive camera.  
It FLOATS with one action camera (or up to 6 oz mounted)
The real magic is in the patent-pending, multi-mounting location, floating frame. The frame makes the ActionHat modular and customizable. With multiple mounting locations, you can wear it forwards or backwards to get the exact shot you want. You can mount an action camera or a smartphone (kit sold separately). Since the camera weight is not on the bill (and front heavy), the ActionHat sits comfortably and balanced on your head. 
ActionHat has multiple mounting locations
Because the ActionHat is used outdoors and on the water, we've had many requests for a mesh back ActionHat. While the request seemed simple enough, the see-through mesh required us to redesign and rethink the support frame completely. We wanted to keep all the great things about the original ActionHat but make it lighter and more comfortable. 
Check out the prototype pictures in the gallery
  After over a year of developing and testing dozens of different prototypes, we are finally ready to launch our new mesh back hats with our patent-pending flexible frame! 
All the components have been designed and tested, now we just need your help to get the molds made and the production started!
By meeting our goal we can new three styles of ActionHats in black. By exceeding our goal, we can add more color option for you to pick from! When that happens, we'll request your color selection in the Backer Survey. 
ActionHat Mesh and ActionHat Visor
The new flexible frame allows you mount two accessories at one time. To use the hat backwards, simply disconnect the mount, slide the frame to the back mounting location and reattach the mount. And just like the original ActionHat, if it falls in the water - it will float!
Take a look through our image gallery for close-ups
                We also created the ActionHat Visor: a simple, lightweight design with one mounting location. Just like all ActionHats, it was designed to pop on quickly and easily with one hand, and it floats!
Check out the overview video below:
Thanks for checking us out! We hope you'll join us on this awesome project and back us by pledging for one of the rewards below:
           Save

Great news, we have received confirmation that the final component will arrive on Friday. We will spend the weekend putting the finishing touches and will begin shipping out next week. Thanks for your support and patience. 
If you have not completed your Kickstarter survey yet, please do so as soon as possible. We need your latest address to be able to ship in a timely manner. 
www.instagram.com/actionhat#TeamActionHat

updates.update_userinfo: YOUR ACTIONHATS WILL SHIP NEXT WEEK!
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers!
Everything is in production and a few of the components are already starting to arrive! We're so excited to see it all coming together. The last component is expected to arrive mid-September and we will be assembling and shipping them out as fast as we can! 
We have a few backers who have not yet completed the survey, we need the survey completed to get your shipping address.

updates.update_userinfo: Production is wrapping up! Ship date ETA: Mid-September!
WE DID IT! Thank You. We are adding a Gray Curve Bill Option!
updates.update_content:
Thanks to everyone who has pledged and supported. We are overwhelmed with the support from this project and excited to get these into production and on YOUR heads!
We will be working tirelessly from now until July 1st (when we get officially funded) to finalize all the details so we can immediately begin production.
With a few more days left, we have set up a stretch goal of $12000. If we can hit that, then we can add a cool gray curved bill to the initial launch. So please continue to share the love and support.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank You! WE MADE IT! 12K Stretch Goal for New Color Option!
Final Sample of ActionHat Blanks Are In! Check it OUT!
updates.update_content:
Thanks to all our backers, we are now officially 50% funded! Please share and help us along on the final stretch. 
If you guys aren't familiar with us, we have been out for over a year already with the original version. Check out our instagram at www.instagram.com/actionhat. We have over 17,000 followers and we look forward to sharing your POV with the world.  
We further broke down the overview videos to showcase each hat on it's own. Don't forget that our new patent-pending frame can fit into any style hat with just a few steps. So if the mesh back and visor is not your style, you can customize your own ActionHat with a hat style of YOUR choice.
